column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column5: "Ao kɛtseankyɛ metse no dɛ nkan no abosoom no mu
column6: Dɛ nda no a Nyankopɔn hwɛɛ mo do wɔ mu no;"

column2: "Aber a ne kandzea hyerɛnee wɔ m'etsifi
column3: Na medze ne kan nantsewee wɔ sum mu no;"

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ metse wɔ me nda pa no mu
column3: Aber a Nyankopɔn n'esumadze wɔ m'asesee do no;"

column2: "Aber a Otumfo no da ho wɔ me nkyɛn
column3: Na me mba so bɔ mo ho aprɔw no;"

column2: "Aber a medze seradze fɔw m'anan ho
column3: Na botan hue ngo esutsen dze ma me no!"
Na misiesiee m'egua wɔ abɔntsen do a
column5: "Mberantsɛ hun me na wɔdze hɔnho sumae

column3: Na wɔdze hɔn nsa totoo hɔn ano;"
Na hɔn tɛkyerɛma femfaam hɔn anomu."
nna ohyiraa me; Na aber a enyiwa hun me no
Na egyanka no so a onnyi obi a ɔbɔboa no no."

column2: "Nyia ɔreyɛ ayew no ne nhyira baa mo do: Na memaa ɔbaa kunafo n'akoma toow ehurusi ndwom."

column3: na ɔkataa mo ho
column4: Me pɛrpɛr yɛɛ dɛ ahentar na abɔtsir."

column3: Na meyɛɛ anan dze maa apakye."

column2: "Meyɛɛ egya dze maa hianyi: Na nyia minnyim no no mpo n'asɛm mohwehwɛɛ mu maa no."

column3: Na muhwiim afonam no fii ne se mu."
Mubowu wɔ me berɛbuw mu
column4: Na mebɛma me nda adɔɔ so dɛ anhwea:"

column3: Na bɔsu so tɔ gu m'abaw do anadwe nyinara."
Na m'egyen dan fofor wɔ me nsamu."

column2: "Emi na nkorɔfo yɛɛ aso maa me
column3: na wɔtweɔnee
Na me kasaa tɔɔ hɔn do."

column2: "Na wɔtweɔɔn me dɛ wɔrotweɔn nyankom; Na wobuee hɔn anomu tɛtɛɛtɛr dɛ wɔregye ɔbɛsɛ nsu."

column3: wɔnngye nndzi; Na m'enyim ne ntsewee no wɔnntow nnkyen famu."
na metsenaa dɛ tsitsir
column4: Na metsenaa dɛ ɔhen wɔ dɔm mu
column5: Dɛ obi a ɔkyekye awerɛhowfo werɛ."
